name: Endless Runner 3D (TransGame668)
description:
If you want to start the game touch anywhere for playing it, There a 2 mode that you can try like straight and rotated. Straight is extreme if accidently fall in you lose & try again, Rotated is Challenging you jump to avoid the block or red block when turn around. Collect some object can make your scores up, Just avoid from the hazard.

Controls: Arrow Key (Straight: Left Right for Move, Rotated: Left Right for Turning & Up for Jump)
